downloadUsage.title: Notify GBIF about use of occurrence data download in a publication (or similar)

form.title: Title
form.titlePlaceholder: Title/name of publication/product in which the data is used
form.linkPlaceholder: Link/DOI to publication/product, if available online
form.commentsPlaceholder: Additional information about publication/product (especially if not a traditional journal article)
